Text:
In two days my share ratio on this has gone to 4.107 and I routinely have 12 or more peers nibbling away at it. I see flags from around the world on my peer list for this file. :)

THANK YOU to all who are helping me seed this important film.

Lots of traffic on this. I've shared 25.831 copies and counting. My uTorrent shows 9 seeds and 39 peers.

A very healthy torrent.

Thanx and enjoy!!!
